Title: Modern UI for WPF
Description: A set of controls and styles converting your WPF application into a great looking Modern UI app. Modern UI for WPF is a spin-off of XAML Spy.
HomeWiki:
MUI has moved to GitHub

Go to https://github.com/firstfloorsoftware/mui for the latest updates on MUI. This CodePlex project is no longer maintained.
